sentences: During the informal high- level Plenary meetings held during the COP, this matter was considered under 'Box A' issues, as identified by President Pronk, which also included adverse effects and technology transfer.
'Informal informal' ministerial consultations co-facilitated by Ministers Mabudhafasi and Auken made progress, except on the outstanding financing issues.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
